LanguageData.RC2_Cigarette.label: cigarette
LanguageData.RC2_Cigarette.description: Cigarettes are rolled from tobacco leaves into paper rolls that are then lit at one end and smoked. They're addictive, cancer-causing but seen as a social activity on the Rim and elsewhere. They've regained popularity on glitterworlds due to the availability of artificially grown and cybernetic organs.
LanguageData.RC2_Cigar.label: cigar
LanguageData.RC2_Cigar.description: Similar to cigarettes, cigars are rolled from tobacco leaves. The main difference is that they are a much higher quality product, using less filler ingredients. They're often flavored too, and usually enjoyed with alcohol.
